kalani kebals samagamata ran sammanayakshri lankawe anka 1 aarakshitha widuli rahan welendanamaya wana kalani kebals samagama shri lanka puhunu ha sanwardhana aayathanaya wisin palamuwarata pawathwu mahajana sanwardhana sammana uleledi ran sammanayen pindum labiya.kalani kebals samagame manawa sampath kalamanakaru gihan widanagama mahatha pawasuwe, “kalani kebals samagama himikaragath athiwishala sarthakathwaye prabalathama parshwakaruwan wana sewakayan wana heyin apa samagama owunge wruththiya ha paudgalika sanwardhanaya wenuwen dawantha wada satahanak kriyathmaka karanawa.
